name: Windows Event
description: Windows activity event class represent a general purpose Microsoft Windows operating system event.

ref_event_code.name: Event Code
ref_event_code.description: The Windows event code, as defined by the Microsoft Windows operating system. It is used to identify the type of Windows event.

ref_event_uid.name: Event Record ID
ref_event_uid.description: The event instance identifier (the Windows EventRecordID).
